summary: Point of No Return Here it is!! The first fic I’ve written in years x’’D This is for my Villain AU, which will contain future...
caption:
Point of No Return

Here it is!! The first fic I’ve written in years x’’D This is for my Villain AU, which will contain future erasermight and all sorts of drama goodies~ I hope this first chapter is received well!!

-

All it takes is a single mistake.

Toshinori Yagi learned that the hard way.

–

“I want your help!” Izuku blurted out. Then he gulped, because he’d just stupidly interrupted All Might. “Sorry! I just - I really, really want your help. I accept your offer.” He swallowed again, anxiety and excitement rising. “I… I want to be a hero! Just like-”

‘Just like you had been’, was left unsaid.

Read here on AO3!

summary: Can you do a hc/scenario with Iida and his s/o on a trip with the class on a bus and they’re sitting next to each other and the...
question: Can you do a hc/scenario with Iida and his s/o on a trip with the class on a bus and they’re sitting next to each other and the fall asleep leaning on each other and everyone see and makes fun of them or think it’s super cute
answer:
Ahhh adorable~

Iida

  • Since they both started dating it just becomes natural for them to sit next to each other
  • They were both very exhausted, since they just got done with training in a remote area and luckily no villains attacked
  • Sitting on the bus, iida is talking to midoriya about training techniques while their talking to Uraraka about how tired they both are and how lovely a bath sounds
  • Soon tho everyone stopped talking mainly because everyone on the bus was tried
  • S/o fells their eyes become droopy and soon they fall asleep and lay their head on iida’s shoulder
  • He becomes stiff to the feeling of them touching him, it’s not like he’s against pda it’s just normally they warn him beforehand but then he looks over to them and see their cute sleeping face
  • He’ll sit there quietly and soon falls asleep as well, letting his head jump on top of theirs
  • Once the bus arrives back to UA everyone begins to get up expect you two and Uraraka goes to check up on you guys and sees the adorable sit of you two sleeping on each other
  • She is quick to take as many pictures as she can before walking you both up
  • She’ll show you guys the pictures tomorrow because right now it’s time to sleep
